Project1.name: Aayush Ecommerce
Project1.details: A responsive e-commerce web app built with React, featuring product browsing, cart management. Deployed on Netlify, it showcases modern front-end development and UI/UX design skills.

Project2.name: Gurkha Shilajit
Project2.details: Gurkha Shilajit is a fully functional Web page. It was created targeting the users of United Kingdom. Users can buy shilajit through this web page.

Project3.name: Aayush Store
Project3.details: Aayush Store is the second project I developed after learning React. It's an e-commerce platform where users can browse and purchase various products

project4.name: Image Search
project4.details: This is my third project, called Image Search. It allows users to search for images and view them in a gallery-style layout.

project5.name: Hamro Teacher
project5.details: Hamro Teacher is a project developed during Sagarmatha Hacks. It aims to act as the bridge between educational institutions and students.

project6.name: BookStore (MERN)
project6.details: BookStore is a full-stack MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) project. It allows users to register, delete, view books online.

project7.name: Personal Portfolio
project7.details: This is my portfolio site created after learning the basics of React.
